channel.title: macos on rebased
channel.description: Recent content in macos on rebased

item.title: Electron uninstaller for macOS
item.description: Recently I was working on an Electron app that needed to work with system audio and for MacOS the authors have opted to use BlackHole audio driver. The app was already in development for some time and already used in production. But there was a problem: when user deleted the app, the audio driver wasn’t deleted from the system. The problem is that during installation the app installed audio driver files into /Library/Audio/Plug-Ins/HAL.
